cpu.description: The amount of CPU resource to allocate to the zeppelin instance.

mem.description: The amount of memory resource to allocate to the zeppelin instance.

zeppelin_java_opts.description: Sets ZEPPELIN_JAVA_OPTS.  You can use this to set arbitrary spark configuration properties (e.g. spark.mesos.uris)

zeppelin_hub_token.title: Zeppelin Hub Token
zeppelin_hub_token.description: Use this token to store and retrieve notebooks from Zeppelin Hub (zepl.com). If empty then it will use notes from your 'Zepl' space

zeppelin_docker_pull.title: Force Zeppelin docker pull
zeppelin_docker_pull.description: Force docker pull of the zeppelin image.

uri.description: A URI serving the Spark distribution to use for the local Zeppelin Spark context.  By default, this will use the value specified in this package's resource.json

executor_docker_image.description: The docker image to launch Spark executors with.  By default, this will use this value specified in this package's resource.json
